#summary Humo syntaxis

= Language operations =

There are only two operations in Humo language:
 # Production definition
 # Production usage

 *===Production definition===
<code language="js">
p1{v1}
</code>
Defines a production p1 with value v1

<code language="js">
p2{p3{v3}}
</code>
Defines a production p2 whose content is a definition of other production p3 with value v3.


 *===Production usage===
<code language="js">
   p1{v1}
   result{p1}
</code>

When producton p1 is found it's replaced by its value v1.
<code language="js">
   p1{v1}
   result{v1}
</code>
